entries.title_d: Evaluate new transport route. We're trying to find a new safe route in the Corellia system and need your help scouting possible routes. When you complete this mission, return to Captain Kreezo in Tyrena for your next assignment.
entries.title: Corellia system: Evaluate new transport route.
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < We are picking up Imperial fighter ship signatures. Prepare to defend yourself pilot! >
entries.quest_patrol_d: When you reach a patrol waypoint you will receive a new one to your next location. Follow each of the patrol waypoints until you reach the end of your patrol.  This is the first of four special assignments given to you by Captain Kreezo. When you complete this mission, return to Captain Kreezo in Tyrena for your next assignment.  After you complete these four special assignments, Captain Kreezo will train you in a new Rebel Alliance Pilot skill.
entries.quest_patrol4_d: Fly to this nav point and continue verification of the new route.
entries.quest_patrol3_d: Fly to this nav point and continue verification of the new route.
entries.quest_patrol2_d: Fly to this nav point and continue verification of the new route.
entries.quest_patrol1_d: Verify that the newly appointed Alliance munitions transport route is safe. Eliminate any hostiles that engage you along the way.
entries.quest_location_d: The Alliance has designed a new munitions transport route here in the Corellia system.
